#text=I went to the library and walked in the door .
#text=I was interested in borrowing a book about the American Revolutionary War .
#text=The book was written by a man named John Canton .
#text=Inside the library there is a bank of computers .
#text=I went to one of the computers and typed in the author 's last name .
#text=There were a number of books by people with the last name Canton , but I quickly found the one I was looking for .
#text=The computer told me the book 's call number .
#text=I wrote it down on an index card I had with me .
#text=I looked at a sign on the wall that told me that books that started with the same letters my call number started with were on the second floor .
#text=I walked up to the second floor and went to the book stacks , the lines of shelving where they keep the books .
#text=I walked along the shelving , looking at the labels on the side of the shelves that said what call numbers were in the aisles I was passing .
#text=Finally I found the right shelf , and soon , again by looking at the call numbers on the books on those shelves , I found the book I was interested in .
#text=I brought the book to the circulation desk and gave the woman working there my library card .
#text=She scanned the book and my card and handed both back to me .
#text=She told me my book is due in two weeks .
